member.name: IMFMediaEngineSrcElementsEx.AddElementEx
member.summary: Provides an enhanced version of to add the key system intended to be used with content to an element.
member.param: The URL of the source element, or NULL.
The MIME type of the source element, or NULL.
A media-query string that specifies the intended media type, or NULL. If specified, the string should conform to the W3C Media Queries specification.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineSrcElementsEx.GetKeySystem
member.summary: Gets the key system for the given source element index.
member.param: The MIME type of the source element.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineSrcElementsEx
member.summary: Extends the interface to provide additional capabilities.
